name: Magic Hole
description:
Magic Hole is a fun casual and time killer mobile game! An exciting game with lots of fun, once you play, you can't stop. Come on, let's take on this joyful saga and play to see which stage you can reach!

- HOW TO PLAY THIS PUZZLE:
• Clear the board by dragging the Magic Hole and eat all the white blocks, do not pull other Colors in.
• You have to eat everything like balls, lines, blocks,...
• Levels will get more and more difficult with the clearing of levels.

- FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• Multiple unique levels.
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy Magic Hole anytime, anywhere!
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Magic Hole at your own pace!

- STUNNING GRAPHICS
• Catchy sound effects with mesmerizing visuals suitable for everyone

- NEED HELP? HAVE ANY QUESTIONS?
